attributes.action: ensure that normal EU competition rules apply to the iPod phone connection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When only O2 have exclusive rights to iPod phone connection there is clearly a breach of competition rules. This allows one company to dictate the service supply and service price to a manufacturers product and limit the end user to one supplier. This is not right. It is not fair to either other service suppliers or end users.
